title: Best of the Program | Guests: AG Eric Schmitt & Kathryn Limbaugh | 10/25/22
description:
Glenn and Stu review the absurdly biased coverage from the New York Times on the latest Florida gubernatorial debate. Missouri AG and Senate candidate Eric Schmitt joins to discuss the investigations he’s leading into the six largest banks and Dr. Fauci. Kathryn Limbaugh, co-author of “Radio’s Greatest of All Time” and wife of the late Rush Limbaugh, joins to share her husband's legacy and his impact on conservative radio.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
